engText: First of all, thank you for visiting my site!
ruText: В первую очередь, спасибо, что посетили мой сайт!

engText: My name as Darya. I graduated South Ural State Univercity in 2020 with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science
ruText: Меня зовут Дарья. Я окончила Южно-Уральский Государственный Университет в 2020 году по направлению Информатика и Вычислительная Техника с дипломом бакалавра.

engText: I mostly used Java for my training projects and homework, but after graduation, considering a lockdown in progress, I decided to try and dive deeper into some front-end technologies.
The last project I started before the graduation one involved Java, Spring, Thymeleaf and MySQL, and was a collection of builds I wanted to do for my characters in one videogame.
It was the first of my personal projects to be a web application. I liked making it and seeing it work a lot, so that's where the decision to dive into it came from
